movie.title: Guddu Ki Gun
movie.description_intro: Guddu Ki Gun is the tale of Govardhan aka Guddu (Kunal Kemmu), a Bihari settled in Kolkata. He is a door-to-door washing powder salesman, whose sales pitch is "Ek washing powder ke saath Guddu free". While sharing a room with his close friend Ladoo (Sumeet Vyas), Guddu leads an amorous lifestyle in Kolkata. His travails begins when he ditches one of his girlfriends, Bholi (Aparna Sharma). Furious for forsaking his granddaughter, Bholi's grandfather casts a black magic spell on him. The only way Guddu can get rid of the curse is to find true love and by staying faithful to her.
movie.description_full: Guddu Ki Gun is the tale of Govardhan aka Guddu (Kunal Kemmu), a Bihari settled in Kolkata. He is a door-to-door washing powder salesman, whose sales pitch is "Ek washing powder ke saath Guddu free". While sharing a room with his close friend Ladoo (Sumeet Vyas), Guddu leads an amorous lifestyle in Kolkata. His travails begins when he ditches one of his girlfriends, Bholi (Aparna Sharma). Furious for forsaking his granddaughter, Bholi's grandfather casts a black magic spell on him. The only way Guddu can get rid of the curse is to find true love and by staying faithful to her.

movies.title: Our Sunhi
movies.summary: A young woman returning to her old school to visit her professor also runs into her old boyfriend and her senior, each of whom has a past with her.
movies.description_full: A young woman returning to her old school to visit her professor also runs into her old boyfriend and her senior, each of whom has a past with her.
movies.synopsis: A young woman returning to her old school to visit her professor also runs into her old boyfriend and her senior, each of whom has a past with her.

movies.title: The Royal Wedding Live with Cord and Tish!
movies.title_english: The Royal Wedding Live with Cord and Tish!
movies.title_long: The Royal Wedding Live with Cord and Tish! (2018)
movies.summary: Beloved television personalities Cord Hosenbeck and Tish Cattigan host live coverage of the Royal Wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.
movies.description_full: Beloved television personalities Cord Hosenbeck and Tish Cattigan host live coverage of the Royal Wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.
movies.synopsis: Beloved television personalities Cord Hosenbeck and Tish Cattigan host live coverage of the Royal Wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.

movies.title: The Golden Boys
movies.summary: A romantic comedy, set on Cape Cod in 1905, about three 70-year-old retired sea captains who try to lure an attractive middle-aged woman into marriage.
movies.description_full: A romantic comedy, set on Cape Cod in 1905, about three 70-year-old retired sea captains who try to lure an attractive middle-aged woman into marriage.
movies.synopsis: A romantic comedy, set on Cape Cod in 1905, about three 70-year-old retired sea captains who try to lure an attractive middle-aged woman into marriage.

movies.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
movies.summary: Martin Blank is a freelance hitman who starts to develop a conscience, which causes him to muff a couple of routine assignments. On the advice of his secretary and his psychiatrist, he attends his 10th year High School reunion in Grosse Pointe, Michigan (a Detroit suburb where he's also contracted to kill someone). Hot on his tail are a couple of over-enthusiastic federal agents, another assassin who wants to kill him, and Grocer, an assassin who wants him to join an "Assassin's Union."
